hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT H.CENTROESTUDIOS as "Centroestudios", H.POSTULANTE as "pkPostulante", H.INFORMATICA as "pkInformatica", H.NIVEL as "Nivel", H.ULTIMOUSUARIO as "UltimoUsuario", H.ULTIMAFECHAMODIF as "UltimaFechaModif", CAST(D.DESCRIPCIONLOCAL as varchar(200)) as "auxInformatica", LE.DescripcionLocal as "auxNivel", h.anotermino, b.Descripcion FROM HR_POSTULANTEINFORMATICA H LEFT JOIN (select * from MA_MiscelaneosDetalle where CodigoTabla = 'INFORMNIVE' ) LE ON H.NIVEL=LE.CodigoElemento INNER JOIN MA_MISCELANEOSDETALLE D ON D.APLICACIONCODIGO='HR' AND D.CODIGOTABLA='INFORMAT' AND D.CODIGOELEMENTO = H.INFORMATICA left join HR_CentroEstudios b on b.Centro = h.CentroEstudios WHERE H.POSTULANTE = :p_postulante
